title: Quotient Property
text: Use the definition of the quotient property, $$\frac{a^m}{a^n}=a^{m-n}$$
speech: Use the definition of the quotient property,  fraction, a to the m-th, over, a to the n-th,  is equal to, a raised to the m minus n power
pacedSpeech: Use the definition of the quotient property,   fraction, a to the m-th, over, a to the n-th,  is equal to, a raised to the m minus n power

title: Using the Quotient Property
speech: What is  times negative 5 minus negative 10
